reviewText: I recently ordered this divas video from the wwf fanatix series in january on pay per view. All i can say is WOW! If you like all these divas or just one that u really like this is the tape for you! Definitly buy it!
This is so bad, it's a total waste of money and time. I'll never buy another WWF Diva series again. Hire some WCW quality Divas please!!!

Vince McMahon is a marketing genius.  That is why the World Wrestling Federation does so well, and is always on the top of it's game.
This video jumps into the lives of WWF Women Superstars Ivory, the Kat, Terri, Tori, and Trish.  Not only are these women quite beautiful, but they truly are remarkable athletes.  The video shows some great ring footage of these ladies, and it has some nice interview time with each one.  On a complete sidenote, I feel that Ivory is one of the most energetic, charismatic people in the sport today, and I was happy that she was featured in this video.
The footage is really good, and the editing was superb.  Of course, any red-blooded man will enjoy this video, but in all honesty, it is done in really good taste.  Anything that Vince McMahon puts his name on is going to be gold, and "WWF Divas - Post Cards From the Caribbean" certainly adheres to this standard.

Hey,i recently got my self a copy of WWF Divas: Post Cards from the Caribbean. I seriously enjoyed the heck out of this one!.This video is  packed with great clip's of Ivory,Terri,Tori,Trish,& The Kat..In and  out of the ring. This tape show's you great camera angle's of all these WWF  Divas and this video is great for any Women Of Wrestling fan!,and the great  interview's from the Divas. I watched this one over and over!.Also if you  like Ivory,The Kat,Trish,Tori and Terri,this tape is more then just great  for you!.I give this tape a 5 Star rating! .

This is a must see for every WWF fan! , it shows the sexiest women of the wwf at their very best, in a behind the scenes look at what happens to kat,  trish, terri, tori and ivory! there's plenty of flesh for all you  red-blooded males and plenty of info on what really goes on with the women  of the wwf definate 10 out of 10!  Buy it now, don't even bother  looking elsewhere!

This video was very average. Of course, you see alot of lovely female flesh from the ladies of the WWF (Tori, Kat, Ivori, Terri, and Trish). The  only problem is that this video runs for 60 minutes, and after seeing it  for 30 minutes it starts to get a little boring. Clips of the ladies PPV  and Raw appearances are included too, which is cool. A word of advice to  parents, though- this video DOES contain nudity (the Kat removes her top  and it is uncensored). But, at least the clip of 80-year-old Mae Young  removing her swimsuit at the Royal Rumble WAS censored (Thank God).So, to  summarize- great if you like to see the ladies of the WWF in swimsuits and  sexy outfits (and really, who doesn't?), but the tape runs a little too  long and gets boring after awhile.

WOW! To start off! Great collection of the hottest divas. IF you want to see the Divas from the past in their prime this is a must have! The Kat is unbelievable HOT! The flash from Armageddon is jaw dropping! Terri, Tori, Ivory, and the hottest Diva ever Trish Stratus all in great wet tshirt photos! I loved this just wish it was on dvd! So if your looking for hot divas do not hesitate to get this!!!

If you like the divas from WWF now know as WWE.

Your not gonna find this on DVD.
You get to see lots of skin. The Kat's flash from Armageddon in 2000.
Tori , Trish Stratus & Ivory in wet tshirts that will make your jaw drop !

LOVE THIS VIDEO OF THE DIVAS OF THE PAST! WHEN I GOT THIS VIDEO I KNEW I HAD TO WATCH IT! YES! IT WAS AWESOME! EACH STORY WAS INTERESTING AND VERY FUN TO WATCH. IT'S A MUST HAVE IF YOU ARE A TRUE DIVAS FAN. IT WAS DIFFERENT FOR ME BECAUSE IT WAS ON A VHS TAPE BUT IT WAS STILL AWESOME. THIS VIDEO ROCKS! THAT'S ALL I'M GOING TO SAY BUDDIES! GET IT!

The first one really is the best! If you aren't buying this just because all of the ladies are gone..you are a jack-off! *lol* It shows some in ring stuff as well as the ladies in really skimpy and tight clothing and in some cases,what they're wearing shouldn't be considered clothing. The WWE really did have alot more attitude back in the day and the product was alot more edgy. You can see Kat's and Tori's breasts in this..don't worry, they censor Mae Young! Buy it if you're a fan, you will love it.

Ivory, the Kat, Terri Runnels, Tori, and the introduction of the greatest of all time Trish Stratus.  This DVD started all the other divas dvds.  It has the sexiest scenes that you will ever see.  The Kat and Terri shwo why they were queens of skin, and Trish Stratus shows why she is going to become the all-time queen of wrestling entertainment. (wet t-shirt, oh baby)

Nowadays the Divas are pretty stunning, but years before they still look sexy and beautiful! Trish, Ivory, Tori, Kat, and Terri all show off their stuffs and it's amazing! The feature is just like any other Diva segments, where each Diva show off their great bodies and tell us a little info on their lives.

Tori is my favorite out of the bunch, because she's so powerful and smart at the same time! She gives great info an knowledge on Yoga and how useful it is to build your body strength and look. She's very smart and talented, it's a shame she's not in the WWE anymore *sob* WWE makes alot of bad moves, but what else is new. Another Diva that shines is Ivory, in all the Diva releases she always expresses how happy she is, and how hyper she gets! I always liked that in Ivory, peachiness!

I recommend this video, Tori's inner/outer beauty is worth it! As well as the rest of the Divas!

One phrase says it all about this video:
Tons of skin.
You get the kat's flash from Armageddon, Tori in a see thru wet shirt, and Trish & Ivory in wet tshirts.

The WWF definately outdoes itself here with divas: postcard from the Carribean. If your a fan of any diva and want to see them as you wouldn't see them on tv, buy this. it was probably the best (price) i ever spent. there's plenty of wet t-shirt footage if you like that as well.

i love this movie and u guys will too. the best 5 lookin divas the kat, tori, trish, terri, and ivory go all out in the carribean and justhave plain fun and we get to watch it. if u like women in sexy bikinis and seeing breasts which is on the movie you will love it and i watched it and still don't get boring and it is definatly your moneys worth.
